rulesDesc: Two people are playing a game. From the pile of 25 matches, each player takes either 1, 2 or 3 matches on each turn. The game is over once all matches are taken. Whoever has the even amount of matches wins.
goalOfGame: Whoever has the even amount while all matches are taken, wins!
yourTurn: Your turn! Take up to 3 matches
exitGameSure: Are you sure that you want to exit to main menu and finish this game?
restartGameSure: Are you sure that you want to finish this game and start a new one?
